properties.description: Cake or Dice is a community board game cafe offering a warm, safe and welcoming space for all.
properties.title: Cake or Dice

properties.address: Dundee and Angus Foodbank, Dundee DD4 6QN
properties.description: The cafe is open to all, we have a ramp available for access, and there is no charge for the cafe. Advice services are available for support in the afternoons.
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.address: St John's Episcopal Church, Angus DD4 6QN
properties.description: The cafe is open to all - whether it's for a bite to eat or a place to blether and stay warm. We have support agencies available to talk to in the afternoons too.
properties.title: Community Cafe and Warm Space

properties.description: Join us for hot drinks, soup, snacks and good company Soup available daily
properties.title: Cosy Corner

properties.description: Every Tuesday morning come along for a cuppa, a scone and a chat between 10am and 12 noon.
properties.title: Cuppa and Chat in the church hall

properties.description: 1st & 3rd Saturday, every month. We provide a selection of teas, proper filter coffee, snacks, and soft drinks or juice, all free of charge. There are art and craft activities or materials available at each session suitable for all ages, or your welcome to bring along your own project. If you prefer to be outdoors, you can also join Helena our gardener, in the grounds. Everyone is welcome!
